name: She Sees
description:
She sees you, always. Are you ever truly alone?

Controls WASDMovementLeft Mouse ButtonInteract Notes

The prototype was developed in about 5 days by myself for the Narrative Driven Jam #2. I really scrambled at the end to get everything done, so a lot of the "narrative" is missing, but there is meaning to the events if you read into it. I hope it's still enjoyable!

Credits

Huge THANK YOU to DreamingofLostRuins for the art used in my intro sequence, for the best of my "faces", and some much-needed guidance in the last couple days!
